Test Name: Miscellaneous University Hospital Clinical Laboratory Tests (MUHCLT)
Specimen Type: Varies by specific test (e.g., serum, plasma, urine, etc.)
Purpose: To provide a standardized protocol for performing miscellaneous clinical laboratory assays and generating accurate, reliable results in compliance with CLIA and MUH standards.
Container: Appropriate container corresponding to the specimen type as required by each individual assay
Equipment: Various laboratory analyzers and instruments specified per assay
